brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts people with various end-user devices communicating over a data network represented by two O S I models. Users on one O S I model are connected to users on the other O S I model via cell phones, desktop computers, and PDA's to O S I Application Layer 7 using wired and wireless technologies.

The diagram title is "Interfacing Human and Data Networks". The caption states: "The Application Layer provides the interface to the network".
